name: Dungeon Escape (itch) (EricRonin)
description:
Hello all, and firstly I would like to thank you for stopping by to check out my little prototype. 

I wanted to learn to use an engine, and the best way is to make a game! So this is my prototype of a 2D Platformer style game. Run through hallways, dodge nasty traps, and pull them levers to get yourself out of this crazy dungeon you wake up in.

Controls are simple:

Z on Keyboard, or X on controller = Interact

Space on Keyboard, or A on controller = Jump

X on Keyboard, or A on controller = Confirm (menus)

Q on Keyboard, or Start on controller = Pause Menu/Start Button

Esc on Keyboard = Fullscreen
